subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Paolo Guerrero scored in the first half as the Brazilian club Corinthians beat Al-Ahly of Egypt, 1-0, in Toyota, Japan, to advance to the final of the Club World Cup.
snippet: Paolo Guerrero scored in the first half as the Brazilian club Corinthians beat Al-Ahly of Egypt, 1-0, in Toyota, Japan, to advance to the final of the Club World Cup.
